singlefamily22.description: Located in the heart of Blue Back Square and West Hartford Center, this luxury condo is one of only 3 units at the Heritage with 3 bedrooms and 2 1/2 baths.  This immaculate and professionally decorated condo consists of 2139 SQFT and offers 9 ft ceilings, hardwood floors and crown moldings throughout.  A spectacular chefs kitchen includes custom cabinetry and high end appliances, a walk in pantry, granite counters and generous peninsula with plenty of seating, great for cooking and entertaining. Enjoy lots of natural lighting in the spacious FP’d living room which features an octagonal dining space with floor to ceiling windows plus sliders to a juliet balcony, perfect spot for a chilled glass of wine and a good book. The 13x15’ master bedroom suite does not disappoint w/ a large walk in closet, master bath, marble floor and counters w/ double sinks, jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  The 2nd & 3rd bedrooms share a spacious full bathroom with tub/shower, marble floors and counters. At the main lobby, concierge service and gracious common rooms greet you and your guests.  An elegant library and media room with community kitchen can be reserved for private functions.  Membership to the New York Sports Club is complimentary.  This unit includes 2 deeded parking spaces in the gated underground garage. The Heritage offers a sophisticated lifestyle in a prime location just steps from top rated restaurants, clubs, boutique shopping, movie theater and public library. Parking spots 54 & 55, storage is #49.

WOW... Seeing is believing. This STAND ALONE Cont. Home in a CONDO development is what you have been waiting for.  Gutted & renovated, this seller has put in over 200K since purchasing. The expansive kitchen & family room are the CENTER of ATTENTION.  Thoughtful renovation focused on QUALITY & TODAY's Lifestyle. Truly a Chef's Dream. The custom cabinets feature a combination of white cabinets & walnut stain center island with fabulous layout. The kitchen flows into the FR that easily accommodates an eat in space & plenty of room for gathering. The enormous LR can be a 2nd FR on the main floor. The Master BR & renovated stylish bath make it easy to move here. No cost was spared -even heated floors. The MBR can easily be your HAPPY space with windows & light galore. The 1st flr also have an additional en-suite with walk in closet too. The Laundry was intentionally relocated to the main floor for easy living. The finished lower level apprx-1136 ft has a rec room, separate office, full bath & add't room- could accommodate that extended guest. Need more- you will have TOOL ENVY... in this workshop. Newer mechanicals, roof, exterior painting & more. DID I mention-gas heat, cair, public utilities & 2 car garage??? Easy access to highways, Bradley airport, UCONN, Hartford, etc. Seldom available in this condition. You truly can pack your bags & move into this home. Gorgeous flowering shrubs, trees & fragrant flowering bulbs will delight you in the summer & spring. Time to be pampered.

Looking for a convenient West Hartford condo in a community loaded with amenities? Look no further. This newer 2 bedroom 2 bath condo is 6 years young conveniently located in desirable Quaker Green. One floor living in secure building with elevator. Inviting open floor plan is light and bright boasting neutral décor, beautiful flooring, kitchen with maple cabinets, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and spacious living room featuring built in shelving and balcony. Balcony has a view of the pool. Master bedroom has a full bathroom, a tub/shower with glass doors and a large walk-in closet. Second bedroom is located opposite master for added privacy. A second full bath has a spacious walk-in tiled shower with frameless glass door that is handicap accessible. Stackable washer/dryer in unit. Space for a study/office or second dining space. One of the only units that comes with attached 2 car tandem garage and enough space for additional storage. Move right in and start enjoying all the amenities Quaker Green offers: fitness room, sauna, heated outdoor pool, grilling area, multi-purpose social room with big screen TV, gas fireplace, kitchen, bar, billiards room and playground. Walking distance to area amenities including great restaurants, pharmacies, services, shopping and library, Minutes from Westfarms Mall, West Hartford Center, Blue Back Square and highway access. Guest parking is plentiful.  Seasonal photos included to show what to expect when pool and hot tub are open

BEAUTIFUL END UNIT! UPDATED KIT/BATHS. GLEAMING HW FLOORS. LARGE LR/DR COMBO W/ FP. PRIVATE DECK. EAT-IN KITCHEN. MASTER SUITE W/ FIREPLACE/WALK-IN/FULL BATH WITH WHIRLPOOL TUB. LARGE PARTIALLY FINISHED LL. 2 CAR ATTACHED GARAGE.

HUD HOME CASE 061-313864 (IN) INSURED. Price Reduced - Second floor front facing unit at 1401 Farmington Avenue. This 55+ adult community offers a security door with elevator and secure underground parking garage with two reserved spaces. Spacious and bright unit offering a large eat-in kitchen with plenty of cabinet space. Formal living room features vaulted ceiling, hardwood flooring, fireplace and door to front balcony/deck. Master bedroom suite offers a bay window, walk in closet and large master bath with double sinks, tub and separate shower stall. 2nd bedroom also features a bay window and includes a ceiling fan. Laundry in unit, natural gas heat & hot water, central AC and public utilities. Building #60 offers an exercise room, card/game room and private storage bay near garage. Close to amenities including West Hartford Center & Blue Back Square. Ex: include but is not limited to: Curtain, drape, non-built-in appliances such as refrigerator, slide-in stove, stand-alone microwave, washer, and dryer, etc, HOA : Association : Monthly : Dues : $632.00 : 1401 Farmington Ave Com Assoc c/o Elite Property Management. Luxurious 2 bedroom 2 bath condo in a fantastic location. Literally steps from Blue Back Square, Whole Foods Market & West Hartford Center, you will enjoy countless restaurants, shopping, coffee & ice cream shops & more. Enjoy this lifestyle opportunity, and the ease of condo living with views of Blue Back and spectacular sunsets  at a fraction of the cost of other condos in the area. The condo itself is in move in condition. There is 1385 sq ft of living space which includes updated bathrooms & kitchen, central air and great closet space A fully applianced kitchen w/ granite counters & newer cabinets opening to the combination dining area and living room with views to the West. The master bedroom includes a full bathroom and walk in closet.Recently added throughout  wood look composite flooring. There is also large walk in closet in the hallway and a storage unit on the main level of the building. Extras include the well equipped work out room with located in Lower Level your building! Plus two deeded covered garage parking spaces. HOA includes  heat, CAIR & hot water property management, snow removal and landscaping. No dogs only a cat allowed

LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!  Spacious condo in highly desirable building literally steps from West Hartford Center.  This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo boasts an open concept living/dining combo with a counter, perfect for entertaining and just enjoying the space.  The parkade hardwood floors add to the charm and you'll have plenty of space in the two ample bedrooms.  The balcony allows views of one of the best neighborhoods in town and perfect for that morning cup of coffee or a refreshing beverage after a long day at work.  Private underground garage allows for easy access in and out of the unit and is essential for those rainy/snowy days.  As the weather starts to turn, think about stepping out, walking less than one minute and being in the heart of The Center.  Access to restaurants, shopping, nightlife, library, movie theater, parks, banking, you name it you got it.  This is city living at its finest.  These units do not come to market often, so take advantage while you can.  This one won't last!

Location! Location ! Walk to West Hartford center from this luxury end unit 3 level townhome.  Built in 2011 this unit features every upgrade that was offered by the builder.  Upon entering you notice the fine attention to detail and the quality of craftsmanship.  The main level features a designer kitchen with white cabinets-glass backsplash-granite counters-island and stainless steel appliances that opens to a large great room with built-ins, a gas log fireplace and a Juliette balcony.  Completing this level is a powder room.  The custom designed master suite is the entire upper level offering privacy and tranquility.  There is a large walk-in closet, marble master bath with a jetted tub and walk in shower that is adjacent to the laundry room.  The first level has a bedroom and a full bath and steps out onto an enlarged private patio. All 1,725 sqft is above grade! There are nine foot ceilings throughout, audio surround system, hardwood floors throughout and an attached garage.  Walking distance to shopping, restaurants and houses of worship this home is not to be missed.

Back on the market! Parsons Farm Townhouse! This terrific 2BR/1.5BA home has many great features including an updated kitchen with beautiful wood cabinets, granite counters and a gas stove, hardwood flooring on the main level, a fireplace in the living room, and central air. Upstairs are 2 spacious bedrooms and an updated full bath. The lower level is nicely finished with neutral Berber carpeting. Located at the back of the complex away from traffic noise, this home also has a lovely brick patio and a detached garage. Parsons Farm is in Elmwood Center with lots of dining options and just a short walk to Beachland and Wolcott Parks, Faxon Library, Trout Brook walking trail, CTFastrack, and the Elmwood Community/Senior Center. Don't miss this best-priced townhouse in West Hartford!

Move in Ready Luxury Condo..Featuring an open floor plan with extensive millwork, crown molding and gorgeous updated revolutions crafted walnut flooring throughout adding to the homes appeal. Living room has floor to ceiling windows, stunning custom built-in with a cosmopolitan flair and door to balcony. A custom built-in features section for Fireplace and TV, desk area, wine storage, dry bar and plenty of storage. Enjoy your views on your balcony relaxing with your morning coffee or evening cocktail. Chef's kitchen offers custom cabinetry, high-end stainless-steel appliances & granite counters. Plenty of cabinet space for your dinnerware and small appliances. Master bedroom is a serene retreat with walk-in closet & spa-like en suite bath boasting double sinks, a soaking tub & separate shower. A second bedroom is set apart for added privacy. Close by is another full bath with tub/shower. Newer washer & dryer is enclosed in a laundry closet for convenience. New furnance(Nov 2019), New Central Air unit. Chic common rooms greet you and your guests as you enter the lobby. The library room, media room, & kitchen can be reserved for larger scale entertaining. In the heart of Blue Back Square this luxurious condo is steps away from movie theater, restaurants/lounges, library, shopping, New York Sports Club (included in condo fee). Concierge services, 1 parking place in the garage, and a storage area included.  Many ugrades..Close to amenities, shopping & highways

Natural light streams through the unique, soaring windows at one of the largest condos in the Steeplechase Complex. Beautifully updated three level home featuring almost 2,500 square feet on the first two levels, with an attached two car garage. The open main level flows for entertaining with an updated kitchen adjacent dining room and front to back living room with custom cabinetry and a wood burning fireplace. Both the living room and dining room have decks with new Harvey vinyl sliders facing the private yard backing up to the woods. The eat in kitchen with it's sky light and an additional new slider to the deck, features hardwood cabinetry, granite counters, a double stainless sink and all Bosch stainless appliances. Two bedrooms and a study are located up the main staircase. The en-suite master has multiple closets and a new laundry in the master bath. The double door study with its floor to ceiling window and two closets overlooks the tranquil backyard. The third bedroom/guest room/office or gym is up a separate staircase with multiple closets and a full bath. There is hardwood flooring throughout, central air, gas heat and an endless amount of storage space. The lower level has a spacious rec room with a wall of bookshelves, cedar room/office and a second laundry in the unfinished area. Exterior Maintenance Free Living with the roof, skylights, decks, painting, gardening and snow removal all taken care of for you.  Make this park like setting your new Home. Please note, the Seller is using the living room as the dining room and the dining room as the living room.

Priced below market value, this is a great opportunity to live in Stonebridge Estates.   Hardwood floors and 9-FT ceilings throughout with custom molding and finer details.  Gorgeous kitchen for entertaining and dining, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite tops on counters and Island.  Two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Bedrooms have upgraded windows for extra light.  Master bedroom has bathroom suite with double sinks, tiled shower and walk-in closet.  Laundry room off of second bath. Unit comes with two assigned parking spaces under car port.  Roof top terrace with gas grills for outdoor grilling and entertaining.  Located conveniently to highway, just over a mile to Blue Black Square and West Hartford center.  Only blocks away from Elizabeth Park and the Pond House Cafe'.  This unit has two assigned car port spaces, much easier to get in and out than parking tandem in the garage.  Owner's with car port's have access to the rear garage entrance via a keypad code which get's them access to the lower level elevator. Building was constructed in 2009. Seller, original owner, moved into this unit in November of 2015.  This is NOT a short sale.  PLEASE FOLLOW ALL CDC GUIDELINES WHEN SHOWING, ESPECIALLY MASKS.

Sought after first floor condo conveniently located on Robin Rd. Unit has been updated throughout...The kitchen and bathroom have been completely remodeled along with custom built in cabinets/bar in dining room...other updates include new floors, lighting, rear deck, & boiler. Located only steps from West Hartford Center and Blue Back. Washer& dryer in unit, Heat & hot water are included in monthly HOA fee.

Location, location, location is where you'll find this well maintained, 1 owner, condo at Somerset. Roll out of bed and take a quick walk or even quicker ride to Starbucks, Dunkin or Panera Bread for your morning coffee. This location is close to shopping, schools and strategically placed for an easy commute into Hartford, to the local hospitals and the highway! This unit boasts 9' ceilings, a beautiful granite kitchen, new natural gas hot water heater and a tastefully updated walk-in shower with tile surround. The unit has been freshly painted and is ready for you to simply pack your bags and move right in! This unit has 2 generous bedrooms and the master bedroom features a private master bath along with 2 closets. There is a separate eating space just off the kitchen and a welcoming large living room. The complex offers a fitness center, fabulous community room, study/library area, outdoor pergola garden and side patio area where you'll enjoy a great summer BBQ. The building is a locked building which can be accessed with coded fobs. You won't want to miss seeing this great space. Condo conveys with a detached garage 71 and storage space 54.

This lovely third floor 2 bed, 2 bath condo features a spacious open floor plan with a loft like feel, soaring ceilings and plenty of windows. Beautiful kitchen with granite counters, breakfast bar, updated cabinets and stainless steel appliances. The large master suite has an updated bath that includes a  tub, shower stall and double sinks plus a large walk in closet. There's a second bedroom and another full bath. The complex offers an outdoor pool, lounge room, recreation room, billiards, playground and fitness center. Located conveniently to shops, restaurants, West Hartford Center, Westfarms, and highways. Washer and dryer in unit. Assigned carport right next to front door.

Rarely available 3 bedroom, 3 full bath unit at Loomis Wooley! Great open floor plan with over 1800 sq. ft. The kitchen is spacious and has a separate dining area with plenty of room for a large table. The upper level offers two bedrooms, each with a private full bath and walk-in closet. The laundry is conveniently located on the top floor as well. The lower level includes a bonus room with a patio and a full bath that could be used as a third bedroom, family room or office. There is abundant closet space throughout this unit. This terrific location is a short walk to Elizabeth Park, a quick shot to both West Hartford Center and downtown Hartford, and offers convenient highway access.

Great opportunity to live in Stonebridge Estates, an Upscale Design..  This is a two bedroom, first floor unit with access from garage, side door or lobby entrance.  Hardwood floors and 9-FT ceilings throughout with custom molding and finer details.  Gorgeous kitchen for entertaining and dining, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite tops on counters and Island.  Laundry room off of entry and coat closet. Unit comes with a car port.  Elevator or stairs to access roof top terrace with gas grills for outdoor grilling and entertaining.  Located conveniently to highway, just over a mile to Blue Black Square and West Hartford center.  And, it is on the bus line.  No need to worry about parking in BBS.  Only blocks away from Elizabeth Park and the Pond House Cafe'.  This unit has one assigned car port space, much easier to get in and out than parking tandem in the garage.  Owner's with car port's have access to the rear garage entrance via a keypad code which get's them access to the lobby and elevator.  There are also visitor parking spots in the rear of the building, right side of carports.

Welcome to your new luxury Stonegate Estate Condo located in the heart of the Walbridge area near Elizabeth Park. This is luxury at the finest of touches. Offering an elevator serviced building with 2 car garage and Roof-Top terraces. These Condo homes come with on-site covered parking, hardwood floors, granite countertops in kitchens and bathrooms, and large closets in master suites. As you enter the condo, you’ll be wowed by the architectural features including crown molding, wainscoting, and coffered 9.5-foot living room ceiling with gas fireplace and open floor plan to the beautiful large kitchen with the top-of-the-line feature, walk-in pantry, and granite countertops. As you make your way through the condo, the luxury continues with (2) a large bedroom, (2) full bathrooms, and a den/office. Need some extra space or just need to get-away, make your way to your private balcony or head to the roof-top patio/deck area with seating and grills. This condo is serviced by private mechanicals right next to your condo for gas heat, gas hot water, and central air. Conveniently located to town and major roadways.

Units seldom available in this desired complex!  Immaculate bright and open unit facing the "Courtyard"! Oversized living-dining room with fireplace and "Juliet Balcony". Large spacious kitchen with granite, SS appliances, pantry and laundry!  Two large bedrooms each with access to private balcony.  Included with the ownership are three assigned parking spaces in the heated barrage under the building!

Exquisite luxury townhouse in a highly desirable condominium complex in Hartford County.  Villa styled townhouse with countless upscale features.  2 story foyer welcomes you into this beautifully designed home.  High end eat-in kitchen with custom cabinets and top of the line appliances. The enormous living room which features custom built-ins is perfect for entertaining.  Large dining room and office/library also featured on main floor.  The upper level features 3 suites, all with full bathrooms.  Laundry is also conveniently located on the upper level.  Come enjoy carefree luxury living with out the maintenance that comes along with a house.

Rarely available luxury two-story brick townhouse with 3584sf, 3 bedrooms, 3.1 baths in private Whiting Estates. The main level features 8ft ceilings and so much wonderful living space with perfect flow for entertaining. The first floor offers an office/den with built-ins; large eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, recessed lighting, stainless appliances include a gas cooktop, double wall ovens, sub-zero refrigerator with freezer drawers, and beverage cooler; living room with hardwood floors and built-ins; and a formal dining room with tray ceiling and hardwood flooring with double French doors to the 19x12 brick patio, overlooking the lawn. Upstairs the spacious master bedroom features a vaulted ceiling, sitting area, huge walk-in closet, and en-suite bath with marble countertops, double vanities, soaking tub and walk-in shower. There are 2 more bedrooms on the second level, both with en-suite full baths, lots of closet space, and a hallway laundry room with full-size washer and dryer and utility sink. Plus new roof (2020), new hot water heater (2019), gas heating, central air, and attached garage with space for 2 tandem cars and room for 2 more cars in the driveway. Wonderful convenient location, close to restaurants, shops, Whole Foods, hiking and biking trails, and minutes from West Hartford Center and Blue Back Square!

Beautifully remodeled 2br 1b condo in highly sought after Quaker Green Complex. Meticulously maintained with many updates including, Quartz counter tops, stainless steel high end appliances, tile bathroom and Luxury Vinyl Plank flooring throughout. Very rare 2 FULL size Washer Dryer Units in custom built storage cabinet. Open floor plan with eat in kitchen and quaint balcony overlooking West Hartford. Unit comes with detached 1 car garage. Take advantage of condo living with all the included amenities like, pool, lounge room, recreation room, billiards, playground and fitness center. Located near by West Hartford Shops and Restaurants!!! Don't Miss this chance to live in this beautiful home. Wont Last!!!

Sophisticated and convenient living at Quaker Green!  This complex has more amenities than any other complex in the area.  Pool, kiddie pool, activity/meeting room, fitness center, billiard room, playground, grilling area.  Just around the corner are restaurants (Pepe's rated best pizza in country), shops, conveniences and a cool vibe then down the street is a town park.  This end unit is the largest plan in the bldg. with an extra space ideal for office,  nursery, another bedroom or whatever you may need. The neutral decor with fresh paint and newer carpet allows for turn key condition.  Enjoy the south facing balcony and extra windows for abundant natural light. You'll love living here...just ask the neighbors!

Beautiful spacious 3 bedroom 2.5 bath Townhouse in the well maintained Quaker Green complex.  The main living area features an open floor plan filled with natural sunlight, 9ft+ ceilings, crown molding, Hardwood floors, stainless steal appliances, gas stove, Corian counter tops and an eat-in kitchen. Living/Dining room combination with a slider that leads out to a patio and back yard space. The Master Suite which is on the second level has a walk-in closet and a luxurious bath with a tiled stall shower, double sinks, and a soaking tub. The second level also features two additional bedrooms with generous closets and a full bath. Third floor loft space with endless possibilities and large basement great for storage or can be finished for additional space.  The complex has tons of amenities including a clubhouse, exercise room, in-ground pool with pool house and playground. A Great Location!!  Walking distance to shopping and restaurants and close proximity to Blue Back Square. This townhouse is a must see!! Call Today for a private showing. Agent related. Pictures were taken prior to the tenant moving in, the bedrooms have since been painted a neutral color.

Enjoy maintenance-free living in this beautifully updated unit in the Steeplechase community! Filled with soaring ceilings and endless natural light from the oversize architectural windows, this 3 bed, 3.5 baths 1900SF unit is a spacious oasis backing to a peaceful brook. The first floor boasts an open floor plan with hardwood floors and a beautifully updated kitchen, complete with white cabinetry and stainless appliances. The cozy living room with fireplace and connected dining room both have sliders leading out onto a private deck, perfect for seamless alfresco entertainment. Upstairs you'll find all three bedrooms, each of which has soaring cathedral ceilings, an abundance of natural light from the large windows, and spacious closets. The master bedroom suite has three closets and an updated bath. The second-floor guest bath has also been updated! If you need more space, the lower level is fully finished!  The lower level features an office, a large rec room, and a full bathroom. Energy-efficient gas heat, newer central A/C (2018), and a two-car garage completes this fantastic unit. Close to transportation and all the best amenities West Hartford has to offer, don't miss out on this fantastic home!

To be Built --- Harvest Village, a quaint neighborhood of 60 semi-attached and attached luxury townhomes. These elegantly styled homes feature an abundance of rich amenities such as, expansive trim detail, granite kitchens, hardwood floors, and much more. Harvest Village offers customized open floor plans and limited first floor master bedroom suites. With By Carrier's industry-leading Peace of Mind Five Year Warranty and energy star efficiency, you will enjoy the carefree and low maintenance lifestyle.

Stunning Elmwood home just 2 miles from West Hartford Center and Blue Back Square. This custom 3 bedroom +loft, 3 full and one half bath end unit offers a fantastic open floor plan, beautiful hardwood floors thoughout with neutral paint and decor, an oversized finished basement and so much more. The first floor boasts a grand entry and oversized living room with cathedral ceilings, gas fireplace and sliders to a back patio, a dining room, an eat in kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range and a breakfast bar. It is an entertainers delight. Additionally the first has a large master suite complete with cathedral ceilings, walking closet and his/hers bathroom. Laundry is also located on the first floor.  The second floor features a sitting room, an open loft (used as an office), two additional bedrooms (both with walk-in closets, a full bath. The lower level adds nearly 1200 additional square feet of living space with a family room and full bath. Enjoy all the amenities of Quaker Green, turnkey living and enjoyment of the outdoor heated pool, fitness center, clubhouse and billiards room. Walk to Elmwood shops and restaurants. Easy access to the highway and FastTrack. Plenty of visitor parking. This location and unit can’t be beat, attached garage! This condo must be seen in person to truly be appreciated. HOA fees include all grounds work, snow removal, heated outdoor pool, and fitness center.
